short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add GitHub Actions restart button on PR page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
From a GitHub Pull Request page, to re-start GitHub Actions workflows needs many steps.

1. Open a `details` link
2. Push `Re-run jobs` gray button
3. Select Mode `Re-run failed jobs` or `Re-run all jobs`
4. Push `Re-run jobs` green button

This extension makes those steps easier.

1. Push `Restart` button in PR page (see screenshot)
